summary: This is a simple mod I wrote of a couple of friends that expands many of the perk sets to include higher levels of existing perks for use with the uncapper.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod I wrote of a couple of friends that expands many of the perk sets to include higher levels of existing perks for use with the uncapper. Each tree is a separate .esp file, so you can enable the ones you want and leave the ones you don\'t want out.

Noteable changes:
-Spell damage/healing gets boosted by relevant perks based off skill points, instead of getting flat percentage gains from perks.
-Most combat oriented basic skills have had their ranks increased from 5 to 10 total ranks.
-Removed most prerequisite perks to allow you to skip over perks you don\'t want.
-Blacksmithing perks were not changed, as Headbomb has already done a great set of mods for crafting

Requires Skyrim -Community- Uncapper:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1175
If you install this with NMM, the custom settings I\'ve made for uncapper will over-write automatically.

----
V 1.1
Fixed error in Sneak perks that caused a game freeze
Added Uncapper file to archive for ease of install
author: Thor
